f21as

Class CustomerList

  • java.lang.Object
    • f21as.CustomerList

  • public class CustomerList
extends java.lang.Object
    CustomerList is a public class that handles a list of customers coming in the queue. It uses a hashmap with specialized operations that can be used on it to add and retrieve customers.
    Since:
    February, 2013
    Version:
    64
    Author:
    Amjad Bari, Wayne Muller, Sanaa Diab
